sentences.en: Accusations of harbouring suspects were raised against the former Hungarian leadership.
sentences.cn: 匈牙利前领导层被指控窝藏嫌犯。

sentences.en: Analysts fear the situation is even worse than the leadership admits.
sentences.cn: 分析家担心情况比领导层承认的还要糟。

sentences.en: He also felt she had not behaved honorably in the leadership election.
sentences.cn: 他还认为她在领导人选举中有不端行为。

sentences.en: He wanted to introduce mature people with leadership qualities.
sentences.cn: 他想引进具有领导素质的成熟人才。

sentences.en: It is wishful thinking to expect deeper change under his leadership.
sentences.cn: 指望在他的领导下发生更深层次的变革简直是痴心妄想。

sentences.en: Leadership does not rest on the exercise of force alone.
sentences.cn: 领导才能并不仅仅在于武力的运用。

sentences.en: Leadership is about the ability to implement change.
sentences.cn: 领导才能就是要有实施变革的能力。

sentences.en: She has the intellectual form to take up the mantle of leadership.
sentences.cn: 她具备担当领导职责的聪明才智。

sentences.en: The ability to work collaboratively is a true test of leadership.
sentences.cn: 与人合作的能力是对领导能力的一种真正检验。

sentences.en: The army refused to accept orders from the political leadership.
sentences.cn: 军队拒绝接受政界领导层下达的命令。

sentences.en: The chief editorial writer also blames weak leadership for the current crisis.
sentences.cn: 首席社论员也把当前的危机归咎于领导层软弱无力。

sentences.en: The leadership moved to sidetrack the proposal.
sentences.cn: 领导层采取行动来转移对该提议的关注。

sentences.en: The next leadership election is due in November.
sentences.cn: 下一届领导人选举将在十一月举行。

sentences.en: The talk was virulently hostile to the leadership.
sentences.cn: 这次谈话针对领导层，言语恶毒，充满敌意。

sentences.en: The US must now take a firm leadership role.
sentences.cn: 美国现在必须扮演一个强有力的领导人角色。

sentences.en: There would be no new taxes under his leadership.
sentences.cn: 在他主政期间不会增加新税种。

sentences.en: They repeatedly questioned his leadership abilities.
sentences.cn: 他们一再质疑他的领导才能。

words.tran_cn: 促使（lead的过去分词）；引导；带领

phrases.tran_cn: 领导技巧；领导技能；领导艺术
总成本领先；全面成本领先；成本优先

trans.tran_cn: 领导，领先地位，领导才能/班子
trans.tran_en: the position of being the leader of a group, organization, country etc
